name: Moon Orbital TD
description:
This project is built for Godot Wild Jam #48 under a week.

Classical tower defense but in moon orbit with unique mechanism.

Github source: https://github.com/Ark2000/Moon-Orbital-TD

How to play it?

The game can be played only with mouse, so don't worry.

You can hit the pause button to get help in game.

Your goal is to protect the moon from meteorite rain. 

To do this, you have to send plenty of satellites to the moon orbit(or wherever). 

Each satellite has its unique ability. If two satellites are close enough, the ability will be shared.

Note that you have to plan orbits carefully, since a falling satellite deals a decent damage to the moon.

The game is not well tested, and it may be a little tricky to change orbit, sorry about that!
